channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Shokz OpenFit Pro Review: Open Earbuds With the One Thing You’ve Always Wanted
item.description: Shokz OpenFit Pro envision a world where open-style earbuds have their own version of noise cancellation—and it actually feels possible.

item.title: The DJI Osmo Pocket 4 just leaked again in a major way — and the launch of the vlogging camera can't be far off
item.description: We now have what appears to be a quick start guide for the DJI Osmo Pocket 4 camera.

item.title: Bosgame M4 Mini PC features an AMD Ryzen 7 8745HS processor, 32GB of DDR5 RAM, and a 1TB SSD — and it’s currently on sale
item.description: Powered by the AMD Ryzen 7 8745HS, the Bosgame M4 mini PC is built for efficient multitasking and modern workloads.

item.title: On a testé le casque vélo Shimano Nova Kineticore : bien éclairé ou bien ventilé, il faudra choisir
item.description: Compatible speedbike et avec une surcouche protectrice, le casque vélo Shimano Nova Kineticore excelle en ventilation même en configuration avec éclairage, garantit un bon confort, mais manque peut-être d’arguments vu son tarif élevé. Voici notre test complet.

item.title: A legendary weather app makes a comeback
item.description: Hi, friends! Welcome to Installer No. 117, your guide to the best and Verge-iest stuff in the world. (If you're new here, welcome, please send Android tips, and also you can read all the old editions at the Installer homepage.) This week, I've been reading about Eileen Gu and Ozempic and fancy grocery stores, trying […]

item.title: There's no such thing as 'military-grade encryption'
item.description: A privacy promise or just a marketing buzzword?

item.title: Are AI training apps like Runna putting you at risk of injury? I asked a real-life running coach — and Runna itself
item.description: 'You do need to have quite a lot of running experience with these kinds of AI services'.

item.title: Boulanger brade à -30 % ce laptop Acer sous Snapdragon X à l’autonomie généreuse
item.description: Chez Boulanger, l'Acer Aspire 14 IA perd 200 euros de son prix grâce au combo entre une promotion et une reprise de votre ancienne machine. Vous pourrez donc l'acheter pour 499,99 euros.

item.title: 14 Best Travel Toiletry Bags, Tested Over Many Miles (2026)
item.description: Our team evaluated a ton of toiletry bags to find the best storage, organization, and design options for all your essentials.

item.title: How to watch Liverpool vs West Ham: Free Streams, TV Channels, Preview
item.description: We'll show you how to watch Liverpool vs West Ham live streams from anywhere in the world as the Reds seek to close the gap to the Premier League top four.

item.title: The Best Gadgets of February 2026
item.description: Sure, Valve delayed the Steam Machine, but Samsung, Nintendo, Sony, and more had surprises in store.

item.title: The Best MicroSD Cards for Your Camera, Switch, and More
item.description: Everything you need to know about memory cards for cameras, video game systems, and more.

item.title: Steam Next Fest, a different flavor of The Witcher and other new indie games worth checking out
item.description: Welcome to our latest roundup of what's going on in the indie game space. It's Steam Next Fest week, with literally thousands of demos for upcoming games for us to dive into. I'm trying to check out as many as I can before the event wraps up on Monday. However, I made a near-critical error in my planning: I opted to try the Raccoin demo first. I could and would have happily played that all week.This is a coin-pushing roguelike deckbuilder that adopts the format of Balatro. To progress, you need to earn a certain number of points and the target increases each round. Every three rounds there's a...
